caption.p: The antibacterial activity of ( a) Abutilon indicum (L.) Sweet leaf extract, ( b) chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles, ( c) green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles in terms of zones of inhibition (ZOIs) at different concentration levels against different bacteria compared to standard drug ( d). (Note: Tukey based heterogeneous lower-case letters represent significant pairs).
